lines.gurmukhi: jYsy qau sill imil brn brn ibKY; jwhI jwhI rMg imlY soeI huie idKwveI [

Unknown.translation: As water acquires the hue of colour that is mixed in it, As the clarified butter conveys to the tongue the taste of the vegetable and other items cooked in it,

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ijs qrHwˆ Pyr jl iml ky rMg rMg ivKy jyho jyhy rMg nwl imilAw krdw hY, Eho Eho ijhw hI bx idKwieAw krdw hY[

lines.gurmukhi: jYsy iGRq jwhI jwhI pwk swk sMg imlY; qYsy qYso sÍwd rs rsnw cKwveI [

Unknown.translation: As a mimic has a definite character of his own adopts different characters for mimicry but he is known by the character that he is mimicking at that moment,

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ijs qrHwˆ iGau jyhy jyhy rsoeI swg Awid nwl imldw hY, Eho Eho jyhy hI rs Bry sÍwd auh rsnw nUM cKwieAw krdw hY[

lines.gurmukhi: jYsy sÍwNgI eyku huie Anyk Bwiq ByK DwrY; joeI joeI sÍwNg kwCY soeI qau khwveI [

Unknown.translation: So does a man of frolicsome mind takes to vices in the company of those whose minds are restless and playful.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ijs qrHwˆ swˆg DwrI nt iek huMdw hoieAw BI Anykwˆ qrwˆ dy ByKwˆ swˆgwˆ nUM Dwrdw rihMdw hY Aqy ijs ijs Bwˆq dy swˆg nUM Fwldw hY auh Eho Eho ijhw hI khweI jwˆdw hY[

lines.gurmukhi: qYsy icq cMcl cpl sMg doKu lyp; gurmuiK hoie eyk tyk ThrwveI [161[

Unknown.translation: But an obedient Sikh of the True Guru becomes God-oriented in the company and teachings of the True Guru. (161)

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: iqsy pRkwr hI cMcl ic`q sMgq dy doK kr ky ilpwXmwn ho ky ijs ijs pdwrQ dy myl nUM pRwpq huMdw hY Esy Esy qrHwˆ dw ho Bwsn leI cpl clwXmwn ho ipAw krdw hY[ pRMqU gurmuK hox kr ky qwˆ auh iek mwqR hI tyk inscw Awpxy AMdr Dwrx kr ky Alyp irhw krdw hY ]161]
